item.description:
Come cheer on Larry and Geralyn as they prepare for the San Diego Rock n' Roll Marathon, benefiting the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society (LLS)! They've been training hard and are ready to celebrate the approach of their goal.

We can help raise money for this great cause by celebrating with them at Encore in North Providence. Geralyn and Larry have organized this fundraiser, and thanks to Chef and Owner, Paul Jalaf, your full $20 goes directly to LLS. There will be free appetizers, live music, a cash bar with $5.00 drinks for the ladies, and door prizes.

May 12, 2010 6:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m.
Location: Encore
1058 Charles Street, North Providence

Search the Rhunning Rhodies team page on Facebook. Please contact Geralyn and Larry at rhunningrhodies@gmail.com to purchase your $20 ticket in advance.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Geralyn and Larry are hosting this one - take a look at their pictures!
item.name: Larry and Geralyn's Send-off Celebration and Fundraiser!
